title: FoundationMorph: a 3D Vision-Language Foundation Model for Unsupervised Medical Image Registration
details: S Pan, M Hu, M Safari, K Shah, F Zhao, T Wang, R Qiu… - Proc. of SPIE Vol, 2025
abstract: This study introduces FoundationMorph, a 3D vision-language foundation model for unsupervised deformable 3D medical image registration. Traditional deep learning approaches struggle with generalizability and require training individual models for …

title: Synthetic data generation for modality-agnostic zero-shot promptable medical image segmentation
details: S Sengupta, S Chakrabarty, KS Ravi, R Soni… - Medical Imaging 2025 …, 2025
abstract: Foundation models for image segmentation have recently surged in popularity after the advent of the Segment Anything Model (SAM). While SAM demonstrates remarkable zero-shot segmentation capabilities for natural images, it struggles to …
